lead_paragraph: The conglomerate's de facto holding company, Cheil, offers $8 billion in new stock for Samsung C&T, a building company.

headline.print_headline: Latest Deal Another Step in Overhaul of Samsung
headline.main: Latest Deal Another Step in Overhaul of Samsung

snippet: The conglomerate's de facto holding company, Cheil, offers $8 billion in new stock for Samsung C&T, a building company.
